alert.note: Alert for Snowy Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 14 at 3:01AM MDT until March 16 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 12 AM WEDNESDAY TO 6 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, mainly at elevations above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Snowy Range. * WHEN...From 12 AM Wednesday to 6 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Mountain travel will be hazardous due to icy, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow. Outdoor recreation could become dangerous to those caught unprepared for hazardous winter conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
